name: Badger has lost his leaf litter trap, can you help him find it?
name_original: Badger has lost his leaf litter trap, can you help him find it?
description:
Badger has lost his favourite leaf litter trap can you help him find it? See what happens when he finds it in this video 

BIFoR on Twitter: "Better to be adding leaves than demolishing the leaf litter traps? https://t.co/8j4g2FpwjN" / Twitter
